summary: The reclusive Patricia Douglas comes out of hiding to discuss the 1937 MGM scandal, in which the powerful film studio tricked her and over 100 other underage girls into attending a stag party, where she was raped.
cast: Patricia Douglas|Baby Peggy|Richard W. Bann|Kelly Brown|Ned Comstock|Joan Crawford|Dorothy Dandridge|Buron Fitts|Jodie Foster|Clark Gable|Oliver Hardy|Jean Harlow|Jack La Rue|Stan Laurel|Judy Lewis|Jennifer Lopez|E.J. Mannix|Louis B. Mayer|Kelly McGillis|Judd D. Minter|Patti Minter|David Ross|Norma Shearer|Eloise Spann|David Stenn|Art Streiber|Michael Taitelman|Jack Terry|Greta Van Susteren|Loretta Young|Duchess of Windsor|Duke of Windsor
keywords: dance lesson|watching television|reference to edward g. robinson|drunkenness|scandal
title: Girl 27
